title: Database Schema
description: This schema defines the Database Schema entity. A `Database Schema` is collection of tables, views, stored procedures, and other database objects.

id.description: Unique identifier that identifies this schema instance.

fullyQualifiedName.description: Name that uniquely identifies a schema in the format 'ServiceName.DatabaseName.SchemaName'.

displayName.description: Display Name that identifies this schema.

dataProducts.description: List of data products this entity is part of.

updatedAt.description: Last update time corresponding to the new version of the entity in Unix epoch time milliseconds.

href.description: Link to the resource corresponding to this entity.

service.description: Link to the database cluster/service where this schema is hosted in.

serviceType.description: Service type where this schema is hosted in.

database.description: Reference to Database that contains this table.

tables.description: References to tables in the schema.

usageSummary.description: Latest usage information for this database.

tags.description: Tags for this Database Schema Service.

changeDescription.description: Change that lead to this version of the entity.

incrementalChangeDescription.description: Change that lead to this version of the entity.

deleted.description: When `true` indicates the entity has been soft deleted.

retentionPeriod.description: Retention period of the data in the database schema. Period is expressed as duration in ISO 8601 format in UTC. Example - `P23DT23H`. When not set, the retention period is inherited from the parent database, if it exists.

extension.description: Entity extension data with custom attributes added to the entity.

domains.description: Domains the Database Schema belongs to. When not set, the Schema inherits the domain from the database it belongs to.

lifeCycle.description: Life Cycle properties of the entity

databaseSchemaProfilerConfig.description: This schema defines the type for Schema profile config.

profileSample.description: Percentage of data or no. of rows we want to execute the profiler and tests on

sampleDataCount.description: Number of row of sample data to be generated
sampleDataCount.title: Sample Data Rows Count

randomizedSample.description: Whether to randomize the sample data or not.
